Screenwriter: Chris Greenhalgh, Carlo De Boutiny, Jan Kounen
Production Co: Wild Bunch, Filmazure, Région Ile-de-France, Centre national de la Cinématographie, Hexagon Pictures, Cinémage 3, Eurowide Film Production, Canal+, TPS Star
Synopsis: A passionate affair between two creative giants begins after French couturiere Coco Chanel (Anna Mouglalis) invites the destitute Russian composer (Mads Mikkelsen) and his family to live in her villa.
Title: Coco Chanel & Igor Stravinsky
